name: Power Strife Deathmatch
summary:
Power Strife Deathmatch is a game with all the hallmarks of old-school deathmatch, you've got your B-hopping, your selection of impractical (and fun) guns all with their own unique alt-fire abilities, you've got weird maps with strange secrets to find, and best yet... A log-book where you can learn all about the characters, weapons and items you'll find in the strangest deathmatch game ever created...

Oh, and I forgot to mention the best part... It also features random item pickups ala mario kart... Just in case you needed the gameplay to get even more hectic...
